title: Why is Championship Riven so hard to get?

embed.description: WIP] With the 2015 World Championship draws right around the corner, a slew of new content and returning legacy content is now available through NOVEMBER 5th- including Championship Kalitsa, Championship Thresh & Shyvana, the FNC / SKT / SSW / TPA team skins, a new ward skin, 2015 World Championship team icons & temporary emblems, lots of bundles, and more!

body: So here's the topic I'd like to discuss: This year, in celebration of worlds, Riot is releasing it's championship Kalista skin (as they always do), but also are bringing back all of the worlds skins. As in the link, Championship Thresh and Shyvana return along with the Fnatic, SKT1, SSW and TPA skins. From a previous post, Riot is giving us the chance to win Championship Riven by completing a perfect worlds bracket. If the other championship skins are Legacy and will return from year to year, why does riot intentionally make Championship Riven so hard to get?
